page.title: ServerlessDays - Home
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community

eventDetails.name: Sydney
eventDetails.tagline: One Day. One Track. One Community

section.name: Speak
section.text: Communities grow through sharing. Take the opportunity to share your experiences working with Serverless platforms and technologies. We're looking for all levels of talks, from beginner to advanced, and all levels of speakers. If you're a first time speaker we offer mentoring, from assisting with your CFP submission, advice on your slides and helping you with your presentation and delivery.

section.name: Find out more
section.text: ServerlessDays will be hosted at **SMC Conference & Function Centre** near Museum Station. Located between Central, Town Hall and Museum stations, it has a wonderful access to the rest of the city with Hyde Park and Darling Quarter, some of the attractions within walking distnace.
